entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS AROUND 70

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
